message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.IOException' import. Should be before 'org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileSplit'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileSplit'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileSplit'.
'METHOD_DEF' should be separated from previous statement.
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not preceded with whitespace.
'METHOD_DEF' should be separated from previous statement.
WhitespaceAround: 'for' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
